About Us

Our goal is to create an environment that nurtures learning, provides opportunities for practice, and enables you to turn your dreams into reality. Since starting out in a coworking space, we have come a long way. We were honored to win the BlooMMasters program at MIT in 2017. And over the past six years, we have successfully trained over 30,000 students and established partnerships with more than 100 organizations across eight countries.
